name: VO//ID - A Simple Ball Platformer
description:
Hello everyone!

This is my first project, VOID - A Simple 'Ball' Platform Game

We use GDevelop5 to make this happen. 

It is released it in 2 platform, Windows and Android

In Game Screenshots : 

This game is still in early access or beta. There must be bugs and inconvenience around. So we want you to test the game and let me know what we can do to improve the game. 

In the first release, there are only 8 levels, but you can contribute some ideas to make this game even better. 

Future Plan :

1. Add more level

2. Complete story mode

Oh yeah, we will also accept donations, it will be used for buying daily foods, etc.

You can support us by donating or... you can click some ad banner (if you play it in Android). Will soon publish to Play Store once it become more full-featured. 

Follow our social media :

Instagram: @FronticDev

Twitter: @FronticDev
